bill_title: to repeal the restriction on the stringency of certain state environmental rules.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to repeal the restriction on the stringency of certain state environmental rules. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 1-40-4.1 be amended to read as follows: 1-40-4.1. No rule that has been promulgated pursuant to Title 34A, 45 , 46 or 46A may be more stringent than any corresponding federal law, rule or regulation governing an essentially similar subject or issue. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
